name: Christina on the Coast
overview: Christina Anstead expands her design business in Southern California, transforming clients' outdated properties into high-end showplaces. Also spotlighted is her personal journey after her split from ex-husband Tarek.

episodes.name: A New Kitchen for an Old Friend
episodes.overview: Christina's lifelong friend, Cassie, is moving back to her childhood home in Anaheim Hills, California. The home has not been renovated in over 17 years, and she's hoping Christina can work her magic on the dated kitchen and dining area.

episodes.name: Master Suite Makeover
episodes.overview: A couple's master suite is very outdated and in desperate need of a makeover; Christina rolls up her sleeves and turns the run-down room into a chic and functional space.

episodes.name: A Colorful Kitchen Makeover
episodes.overview: In Tustin, Calif., a couple starts to work on cosmetic changes to their new home, but they have to put the kitchen on hold when their daughter is born; now, they need Christina's expertise to update the space.

episodes.name: Tore Down From the Floor Down
episodes.overview: In Costa Mesa, Calif., a couple wants to update their master bedroom and bathroom, and they need Christina's help to merge their tastes into a cohesive design; while she's a fan of rustic decor, he prefers modern, clean and contemporary.

episodes.name: Sweet Master Suite
episodes.overview: A couple who has been steadily renovating their Huntington Beach home has only one room left to conquer; they hope Christina can turn their cramped, dark master suite into the bathroom of their dreams.

episodes.name: Getting a New Kitchen
episodes.overview: A couple is in a rush to renovate their kitchen before the arrival of their second child; they have faith that Christina will help them figure out the perfect makeover for their growing family in time.

episodes.name: Killer Kitchen for Mom
episodes.overview: A busy mom of three requests the ultimate kitchen; she wants Christina to give the dated space an open-beachy feel while still keeping it functional for her family.

episodes.name: Wedding Special
episodes.overview: The house hunt begins after Christina and Ant decide to move in together; the clock is ticking as they rush to renovate and move into their dream home before hosting a secret wedding.

episodes.name: My Perfect Paradise
episodes.overview: Christina and Ant take on an ambitious backyard remodel for their newly blended family to enjoy during the summer.

episodes.name: Catching Up
episodes.overview: Christina reminisces several moments from the season.

episodes.name: Firehouse Functional Kitchen
episodes.overview: Christina helps a local firefighter with a kitchen renovation; his wife would prefer a clean look, while he wants something reminiscent of the firehouse.

episodes.name: Pando Express
episodes.overview: A recently married couple is blending both their family and style; while he made upgrades to the house years ago, she's ready to insert her own flavor so the space reflects both of their personalities and their new life together.

episodes.name: Counting Down to a Kitchen and a Baby
episodes.overview: A couple expecting their first child takes on a kitchen renovation and hope to complete it before the baby arrives; she has a boho-chic style, and it doesn't mesh with his hopes for something clean and sleek.

episodes.name: Blowing Out the Walls
episodes.overview: After living in their home for 17 years and saving up for the past 12, a couple dives into a massive renovation to create their dream kitchen; Christina plans an open concept, but unexpected discoveries threaten her idea.

episodes.name: Out with an Original Bathroom
episodes.overview: Christina helps her best friend, Cassie, renovate her kitchen and living room, but the upstairs doesn't fit the new vibe; now, Cassie tackles her master bathroom but struggles to make sacrifices to stay on budget.

episodes.name: Dysfunctional to Functional Kitchen
episodes.overview: Christina returns to work after having her baby, but she may need help from her friends as she juggles a newborn and tackles her new clients' home. The couple wants a bright kitchen with a modern-farmhouse design and a layout that opens up their space.

episodes.name: Wellness Remodel
episodes.overview: Christina helps her good friend and business partner, Cara, and her husband remodel their main bedroom and bath. When the couple can't see eye-to-eye on design and unexpected costs begin to mount, Christina faces pressure to make both of them happy.

episodes.name: Bold Kitchen for a Brit
episodes.overview: A British ex-pat and his wife decide to renovate their outdated kitchen. Christina designs a modern-Craftsman look for the space, but getting all of the elements to match becomes a huge challenge.

episodes.name: A Clash of Style
episodes.overview: Newlyweds tackle a big kitchen and living room makeover that leaves them stressed out and on opposite sides of the design spectrum. Christina plays mediator to help them get on the same page while delivering a stunning new design.

episodes.name: Industrial Kitchen with Boho Flair
episodes.overview: Christina's clients want to update their dark and outdated kitchen, challenging her to balance their contrasting styles; she's further put to the test when rain delays the renovation and materials go out of stock.

episodes.name: A Touch of Indecision
episodes.overview: Empty nesters tackle a long overdue kitchen remodel in their midcentury modern home, and the couple want it to sing with Liberace glam, but all that fabulousness comes with some sticker shock.

episodes.name: Heartfelt Hacienda Makeover
episodes.overview: When Christina's design partner James brings her a project from a musical family in Fullerton, California, she learns that their house is full of memories and tailors her design to underscore a homeowner's nostalgia.

episodes.name: A Marriage of Styles
episodes.overview: When a friendly playdate turns into a request for help, Christina takes on a coastal couple's primary bathroom redesign. She's got to find a way to satisfy a design-centric mum while meeting her Hollywood stutman husband in the middle.

episodes.name: New Design in the Old Hood
episodes.overview: When Christina's old neighbors contact her for design help, she's tasked with remodeling a large, water-damaged home. Working with a floor plan similar to her old house, Christina gets to remake parts of their home in ways she never got to do in her own.

episodes.name: Boho Industrial Bathroom
episodes.overview: After a successful kitchen renovation, Christina returns to design a couple's upstairs bathroom. This time around, Christina's task is to balance the couple's differing styles while also planning her own daughter's 10th birthday party.

episodes.name: Midcentury Boho Home
episodes.overview: After Christina bumps into a friend who runs one of her favorite design stores, she signs on to help him remake his new home. Simultaneously, she's offered the chance to go out of her comfort zone on a new beachside project.

episodes.name: Modern Kitchen Meets Waterfront Dream
episodes.overview: When Christina's contractor brings her a new kitchen project, she must find a compromise between the homeowners' contrasting modern and rustic design styles. Meanwhile, Christina works at warp speed to style a San Diego beach house.

episodes.name: Tall Family, Big Reno
episodes.overview: Christina's delivery nurse for Hudson just had her fourth child, and she needs help with a recently purchased fixer-upper. Christina promises to redesign the kitchen and living room, but she has no idea what's in store at this old Huntington Beach home.

episodes.name: Home Run Reno
episodes.overview: A sports-loving family is in over their heads after trying to take on a major rehab themselves, so Christina steps in for an assist with their bathroom, kitchen and living room. Then, Christina helps her best friend get ready for her big wedding.

episodes.name: Pink Plight to Contemporary Delight
episodes.overview: When Christina makes friends with a new neighbour, she finds out her primary bathroom is in need of a major design makeover in order to complement the rest of their contemporary, bohemian home.

episodes.name: Traditional Meets Modern Kitchen
episodes.overview: Christina must stick to a strict budget as she helps a young couple with differing, eclectic styles redesign their kitchen. Meanwhile, Christina deals with lots of new changes in her personal life.

episodes.name: Midcentury Kitchen Reno
episodes.overview: When Christina takes on the redesign of a 1950s midcentury home, she helps a family preserve their history while turning a dark, closed-off kitchen into an open and bright entertaining space that will create new memories for years to come.

episodes.name: Massive Kitchen Makeover
episodes.overview: Christina takes on new clients who recently moved from Colorado to her hometown of Yorba Linda, California. Along with her design partner James, Christina works with the family to redesign their outdated kitchen and living room.

episodes.name: Zen Kitchen Transformation
episodes.overview: Christina's new Long Beach clients have lived in their 1950s-era home for over a decade, and now they want to overhaul their walled-in kitchen and living room to create an open indoor/outdoor living space.

episodes.name: Reno Before Wedding
episodes.overview: Christina takes on a kitchen redesign for a pair of elementary school sweethearts on an expedited schedule. She must race to finish this major renovation before the couple's imminent wedding!

episodes.name: A New Outlook
episodes.overview: As Christina settles with Josh and the kids into a new home, she and James catch up and get back to work; their first project is transforming a couple's cramped, outdated kitchen and dining room into an open space for recharging and entertaining.

episodes.name: More of the Warm Hug Home
episodes.overview: Christina and James revisit clients who want to carry the Zen vibe into the rest of their home by renovating both of their bathrooms. Also, a pool party finds Christina plotting the perfect outdoor retreat for contractor Mike and his family.

episodes.name: Put Another Dime in the Jukebox
episodes.overview: Christina and James help clients revamp their kitchen, living space and two bathrooms to better suit their growing family and give a fresh, beachy feel to their coastal home. Meanwhile, Christina and Josh find the home of their dreams in Newport Beach.

episodes.name: Big Family, Tiny Kitchen
episodes.overview: Grade-school sweethearts enlist Christina's help to expand their tiny kitchen into an indoor-outdoor entertainment space for the entire extended family. Also, Christina prepares to take a leap, expand business, and take on design clients in Tennessee.

episodes.name: Outgrowing Old Spaces
episodes.overview: Christina helps Amy and Scott transform their home to better serve their active family of five. Christina's best friend Cassie, and husband James, reveal an important detail of expanding their own family at their daughter Jules' first birthday party.

episodes.name: A Dog's Life
episodes.overview: Christina helps fellow French Bulldog parents, Danny and Nicole, create a living space perfectly suited for entertaining their two and four-legged friends. With the help of a pet communicator, Christina and Josh create a deeper bond with their dogs.

episodes.name: Vacation Vibes
episodes.overview: Christina helps Terri and Sam create a five-star resort style primary bedroom that includes a bathroom doubled in size and converting a room into a spacious walk-in closet. And to save on budget, James and Christina create a DIY shiplap accent wall.

episodes.name: Delays for Days
episodes.overview: Christina helps couple Leanna and Chis renovate their 1970s-style bedroom into a peaceful space to unwind after a busy day. With unforeseen delays, Christina puts in the extra effort to make sure this family receives the full Zen they deserve.

episodes.name: Taking the Plunge
episodes.overview: As homeowners Jon and Lindsay take on two renovations at once, Christina ensures the living area and kitchen match the updated pool and outdoor space. With wellness in mind, Christina and Josh update their own backyard by adding a sauna and ice plunge.

episodes.name: Friendship for Ages
episodes.overview: Christina gets a call from childhood friend Carlos and his wife Natalie who need to revamp their kitchen, bathroom, fireplace and bar to make the house cohesive. Also, Christina's daughter, Taylor, is getting older and ready for a more grown up style.

episodes.name: Renew for the Ocean View
episodes.overview: Homeowners Shawn and Michael want Christina's help to transform their outdated coastal home into a modern-day retreat. Christina takes on remodeling the kitchen and living area so that Shawn and Michael can make the most out of their gorgeous ocean view.

episodes.name: Every Foot Counts
episodes.overview: Christina helps homeowners Jenny and Tobias renovate their cramped house for their family of five. While it has a stunning view, the home needs a functional layout. Meanwhile, Christina and James have quality time together while Josh is in Tennessee.

episodes.name: Always Upgrading
episodes.overview: Christina helps Teri and Bradley transform their family home of almost 30 years into a modern coastal retreat. Meanwhile, Christina and Josh begin the process of upgrading their automated kitchen into a warmer, more functional space for their family.

episodes.name: The 16 Year Kitchen
episodes.overview: Engineers Cliff and Nadine have been planning their renovation for over 15 years, and they need Christina to help bring the vision of their kitchen and living room into reality. At home, Christina and Josh complete the renovation of their own kitchen.

episodes.name: New Bathroom, New Baby
episodes.overview: Repeat clients mean happy clients, so Christina's excited to update Gina and Eric's primary bathroom to match the reno on their kitchen. Also, Christina's friend Cassie has a baby on the way and enlists her help to convert a spare bedroom into a nursery.

episodes.name: Growing Up Christina
episodes.overview: A personal project for Christina as she renovates her childhood home for her parents, Paul and Laurie. In this emotional and challenging project, multiple spaces will undergo much-needed transformations while preserving the existing footprint and cherished hardwood floors.

episodes.name: Surf En Suite
episodes.overview: Christina helps a young family on a tight budget expanded their primary bedroom and design the kitchen of their dreams.

episodes.name: Starting From Scratch
episodes.overview: Christina takes on a couple's home that's full of odd corners and nonfunctional spaces.

episodes.name: Buckling Under the Timeline
episodes.overview: A couple who recently purchased a house need help making it a home for them and their three kids.

episodes.name: Coastal Country Refresh
episodes.overview: In this episode, Christina focuses on expanding their outdated kitchen, which has not kept up with the couples needs over the years.

episodes.name: Historically Hip
episodes.overview: Christina assists other French Bulldog owners in designing a setting that is ideal for hosting both their two- and four-legged friends.

episodes.name: No Walls No Problem
episodes.overview: Christina helps Terri and Sam create a five-star resort style primary bedroom that includes a bathroom doubled in size and converting a room into a spacious walk-in closet. And to save on budget, James and Christina create a DIY shiplap accent wall.
